CustomField.formula: If(ISBLANK(EndDate__c),If(And(Month(TODAY())>= month(StartDate__c), Day(TODAY()) >= Day(StartDate__c)), Year(TODAY())- Year(StartDate__c) + (Month(TODAY())-Month(StartDate__c))/12, if(And(month(TODAY())< month(StartDate__c), Day(TODAY())>= Day(StartDate__c)), Year(TODAY())-Year(StartDate__c)-1 + (12 - Month(StartDate__c)+month(TODAY()))/12, if(And( month(TODAY())< month(StartDate__c), Day(TODAY())< Day(StartDate__c)), (Year(TODAY())-Year(StartDate__c)-1) + ((12 - Month(StartDate__c)+month(TODAY())-1))/12, if(And( month(TODAY())= month(StartDate__c), Day(TODAY())< Day(StartDate__c)), (Year(TODAY())- Year(StartDate__c)-1) + (11/12), (Year(TODAY())- Year(StartDate__c)) + (Month(TODAY())-Month(StartDate__c)-1)/12)))),If(And(Month(EndDate__c)>= month(StartDate__c), Day(EndDate__c) >= Day(StartDate__c)), Year(EndDate__c)- Year(StartDate__c) + (Month(EndDate__c)-Month(StartDate__c))/12, if(And(month(EndDate__c)< month(StartDate__c), Day(EndDate__c)>= Day(StartDate__c)), Year(EndDate__c)-Year(StartDate__c)-1 + (12 - Month(StartDate__c)+month(EndDate__c))/12, if(And( month(EndDate__c)< month(StartDate__c), Day(EndDate__c)< Day(StartDate__c)), (Year(EndDate__c)-Year(StartDate__c)-1) + ((12 - Month(StartDate__c)+month(EndDate__c)-1))/12, if(And( month(EndDate__c)= month(StartDate__c), Day(EndDate__c)< Day(StartDate__c)), (Year(EndDate__c)- Year(StartDate__c)-1) + (11/12), (Year(EndDate__c)- Year(StartDate__c)) + (Month(EndDate__c)-Month(StartDate__c)-1)/12)))))
CustomField.label: Length of Employment
